item.title: Wordpress
item.description: WordPress 安装 安装依赖： $sudo apt install apache2 $sudo apt install mysql-server $sudo apt install php5 下载wordpress： $cd /var/www/html $git clone https://github.com/WordPress/WordPress.git 配置 添加mysql数据库： $mysql -u root -p mysql> create user 'wordpress'@'localhost' identified by '******'; mysql> create database 'wordpress'; mysql> GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON
